website_summaries.verdict: Large, reasonably priced durable tent that can withstand the elements to supply needed shade to a wedding or other outdoor party.
pros: Can hold up to 40 people, making it a great option for bigger gatherings
Sturdy design, will stay up for days in even less than optimal conditions
Relatively quick and easy to set up
The thick nylon ropes provide extra support
cons: Watch out for sharp corners on stakes, as several users have reported damage to tent ropes or clothing
filing them down may reduce potential problems

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult to assemble. Better have 7-8 people for assembly. Very difficult to keep up in storms...rain collapses it and wind takes out poles. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Clark Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Nice, thick canopy material with solid grommets and d-ring ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, thick canopy material with solid grommets and d-ring tie-offs.. Sturdy poles. Beefy, nylon ropes (instead of thinner para-cords). Superb, big ground stakes, but they are sharp in the cutouts - either use a grinder / file to dull the rope channel or use some kind of rope guard (like a piece of webbing or leather) to protect the lines.
customer_reviews.author: Kawika on Kindle

customer_reviews.title: Great Tent
customer_reviews.text: My company is using this for outside meetings during COVID. It has been up for over a month now and has held up wonderfully in all kids of weather. Great tent for the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small stakes to hold up the tent
customer_reviews.text: I did not use the small stakes provided- I got some that was 10 inches longer for more stability. Also, I have used tent two times- and already a hole in the top :(
customer_reviews.author: daisy1965

customer_reviews.title: PEGS SUPPORT ARE NOT BIG ENOUGH
customer_reviews.text: The Stacks pegs for the tent are not long enough to hold the strength of the tent ,it came not strong and fail to assembly ,when fall down it broke the tent ,no recommended at all
customer_reviews.author: eduardo sotomayor

customer_reviews.title: The sturdieness
customer_reviews.text: I own 2 of these and they with stand winds of 30 mph and are very sturdy. I'm a rental company so my customer s are # 1. Will be buying more...
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this product
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed with quality materials, the metal stakes where the ropes attach have a small sharp edge that will cut the ropes. A dremmel with a grinding wheel solved the issue. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful and worked wonderfully for our event. We set it up a day before and it was a windy day, it stayed up with no issues. Extremely durable tent
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this tent a week ago. Great quality very satisfied will be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great tent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for the price. Put it up in about half hour with no directions. Tent stood up in a good rain and wind storm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little tent. Easy up. Stakes could be better but for the money a great quick tent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tent. This is all you need, no upgrading necessary.
customer_reviews.text: The best tent ever. We used it for a birthday party. We had so many compliments about the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Debrica Jolivette

customer_reviews.title: Decent tent
customer_reviews.text: Pro-Tent top looks and feels great. Cons - mines had a small whole near the top. Also the edge of one pole was really sharp which sliced a chuck off my thumb(yes a bloody mess). I wish there were horizontal support poles for the legs. Also instructions said you could watch a video but the site is not working. But directions are easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Nice tent but poles are not that sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The poles are not very sturdy and bent when installing for the first time for our son's wedding last Saturday. Is there a w way to get an extra set of poles?
customer_reviews.author: Beverly A. Dahlstrom

product_meta.title: 20' Foot x 20' Foot Weekender Standard Pole Tent - Heavy Duty White 14 Ounce Vinyl Canopy Top - Complete Frame/Top Set with Storage Bag for Weddings, Parties, and Events
product_meta.description:
Pole tents are best suited for setup on grass or soft surfaces. Pole tents may be utilized on blacktop or asphalt, but it will require the use of heavy duty stakes and a stake driver for drilling into the ground. Usage on concrete surfaces is not recommended.

If you're looking for a lightweight party tent that can be assembled with minimal tools and packed up without the need for a truck or trailer, then our 20' x 20' Weekender Standard Canopy Pole Tent is the answer. This standard party pole tent will provide a shelter for your next outdoor event with a quick and easy setup process, as well as being easy to transport after tear down.

These Weekender Party Tents feature galvanized steel tent poles and a single piece tent top, constructed from commercial-grade, 14oz translucent vinyl that is 100% waterproof and resistant to mold, mildew, and flame. All panels are bonded with 1" heat-sealed overlapping seams and have scalloped valances bonded with vinyl binding. Guy ropes are spliced at all pole locations and the tent top also has sidewall ropes that are permanently installed, should you want to add sidewalls for added protection from the wind and elements (Sidewalls sold separately). This Weekender Party Pole Tent is great for weddings, rehearsal dinners, bridal parties, graduations and other outdoor events.

Please Note: Use only supplied rope for staking. Ratchet straps are not recommended to be used with this tent.


Features:
One-piece top
Our best quality, 14 oz. translucent vinyl.
All panels are bonded with 1" heat-sealed overlapped seams.
Scalloped valances bond with vinyl binding
Sidewall rope permanently installed.
Guy ropes and jump ropes are spliced in at each pole location.
Includes poly top and side pole bag.
Heavy duty 2-piece 1.25" steel side poles.
Heavy duty 4-piece 1.75" center poles.
Steel angle tent stakes.
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY - White 14 vinyl top, designed to withstand the wear and tear of being set up and taken down multiple times each year
SIZE - 20 ft x 20 ft, ideal for approximately 33 people to sit down and eat, 40 people for buffet style dinner, 50 people for cathedral (row) seating, and 80 people for a standing cocktail party
LIGHTWEIGHT - Can be packed up and setup without a truck or trailer and minimal tools
USES - Perfect party tent for your outdoor event, including weddings, graduations, church functions, reunions and more! Please Note: Pole tents are best suited for setup on grass or soft surfaces.
SAFETY - Fire-resistant vinyl, exceeds all National Fire Protection Association fire resistant standard
